mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, EARTH_DISTANCE(LL_TO_EARTH(LATITUDE, LONGITUDE), LL_TO_EARTH(#{latitude}, #{longitude})) AS DISTANCE FROM STORE) AS _ WHERE DISTANCE <= #{distance}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE(ACCOUNT_ID, NAME, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, ADDRESS, INFO, PHONE_NUMBER, CAN_RESERVATION, OPERATING_TIME, IS_OPEN, PROFILE_PHOTO, PHOTOS) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{name}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{address}, #{info}, #{phoneNumber}, #{canReservation}, #{operatingTime}, #{isOpen}, #{profilePhoto}, #{photos})
mapper.update: UPDATE STORE SET (NAME, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, ADDRESS, INFO, PHONE_NUMBER, CAN_RESERVATION, OPERATING_TIME, PROFILE_PHOTO, PHOTOS)= (#{name}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{address}, #{info}, #{phoneNumber}, #{canReservation}, #{operatingTime}, #{profilePhoto}, #{photos}) WHERE ID = #{id}
